name: Small Stone
details:
Analog Phase ShifterGet the sound that made the Classic 1970 Small Stone famous. Generates thick sweeping phase shifting with liquid transparency. Feedback color control adds a tingling swirl. Blues players dig the Stone's rapid rotating speaker effect. Country players add tasty seasoning to their chicken pickin'. Metal-heads dig its jet plane swoosh. 
Quick Specs

True bypass
Variable rate control allows slow and smooth to rapid edge frequency sweeps
Color switch adds Q and thins the moving comb filters
Tough and compact die-cast chassis
9-volt battery included
Optional 96DC-200BI power supply available

https://www.ehx.com/products/small-stone
